column1: Figure 2. Change in the number of prisoners under state and federal jurisdiction, 2000–2010
Data source(s): National Prisoner Statistics Program
Author(s): Paul Guerino, Paige M. Harrison, and William J. Sabol
Figure 2. Change in the number of prisoners under state and federal jurisdiction, 2000–2010

Note: Jurisdiction refers to the legal authority of state or federal correctional officials over a prisoner regardless of where the prisoner is held. Percent change is calculated based on December 31 jurisdiction counts.
Source: BJS, National Prisoner Statistics Program.
